title: Interpretation of stones in a dream Pebbles and rocks in a dream

preview.html: A dream about stones for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man, whether he is throwing stones, conveys the combination of being thrown with white or black stones, small or large pebbles, according to Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Imam al-Sadiq, and more interpretations in the continuation of the topic below. Stones in a dream from The strange dreams that we see in our dreams continuously and cause us great confusion, as stones are present around us throughout our general lives and we deal with them constantly, and we may see our dreams with many. Different shapes and meanings bring us a large number of important connotations and signs that the dreamer must be aware of, and we may be exposed to stones falling on us in a dream or see stones in any of the areas. We will explain to you in our article today the complete interpretation of seeing stones in a dream, as interpreted by the translator Ibn Sirin in All of its different interpretations that the dreamer needs. Interpretation of stones in a dream. Seeing white stones surrounded by mountains in a dream indicates the presence of a hard-hearted person in the dreamer’s life. Seeing someone turning into stones in a dream means that the dreamer is a guilty person in his life. The dreamer resorts in the dream to his stone as evidence. However, he has committed many sins. A patient who sees stones in a dream indicates the dreamer’s death in the near future. A woman who sees black stones in a dream is evidence that she suffers from great worries, problems, and sorrows in life. Seeing stones in a dream is evidence of immorality and immorality. In the dreamer’s life. Seeing mountains and stones in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s long life. Seeing a village full of stones in a dream is evidence of the complete license of his relative. Seeing black stones in a dream is evidence of continued success in work and life and obtaining the highest ranks and positions. Seeing a single person riding stones in The dream is evidence of the soonest date of his marriage in life. Repeatedly knocking stones in a dream by a young man means that he will achieve many desires and goals in public life. Seeing stones in a dream Seeing stones in the house is evidence of the cruelty of the people of the household. Seeing stones in a dream is a sign of the presence of Problems, anxiety, and disagreements in the dreamer’s life. Seeing stones falling from the sky in a dream is evidence of the fulfillment of desires and ambitions. Seeing an unmarried woman sitting on a stone in a dream means that she is waiting for her future husband, who will propose to her in the near future. Seeing large stones in a girl’s dream indicates She is a smart girl in life. Seeing stones in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of an easy and simple birth and an imminent due date. Seeing stones in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a healthy, healthy child. Seeing black stones in a dream is a sign of hardening of the heart. Seeing stones in a dream varies. It varies from person to person and varies according to place and time. Arab scholars and dream interpreters say that seeing stones from afar is evidence of worries and problems in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of stones in a dream for a single woman: If she sees an unmarried girl in a dream

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about a dead snake from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a Mitiri snake by translators: The dream portends evil, but it shows good in some cases, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a snake with a dead person for single, married, pregnant women and men according to Ibn. Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about a dead snake by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake about a dead person? The dream indicates that the dreamer will soon triumph over his enemies at work and will enjoy the comfort, stability and calm that he has missed for a long time. The dream indicates positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life. In the coming period, he will get rid of a certain person in his life who was jealous of him and who was causing him harm. If the dead snake offends him in the dream, this indicates the presence of an enemy who hates the person in the vision and is waiting for an opportunity to harm him. The vision conveys a message to the dreamer telling him not to trust those around him during this time. Time, especially those close to him, because there is a traitor among them who seeks to harm him. If the dreamer sees a dead person who knows that he is giving him a colorful and beautiful snake, then the dream indicates that he will become a high-ranking person in the future and occupy a high position in society. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead snake according to Ibn Sirin? He sees Ibn Sirin said that the vision symbolizes the dead person’s need for prayers, so the dreamer should pray for him often with mercy, forgiveness, and morals. If the dreamer sees an unknown dead person carrying a large and ferocious snake in his dream, this indicates the presence of a strong and dangerous enemy in his life who plans to harm him, so he should Be careful. If the dreamer dreams of his deceased daughter playing with snakes, this symbolizes that he will succeed in his professional life, expand his business and increase his financial income soon. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google. The Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site includes thousands of interpretations by major interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a woman. DeadIf the snake was small, the dream indicates that there will be some minor problems in an individual’s life, but they will end after a short period of time. If the dreamer sees herself dying and comes back to life, and finds many snakes around her and feels afraid and lost, then the vision leads to abandoning Obligations such as fasting and prayer, so she must reconcile what is between herself and God. . (The Almighty) and return to Him and ask Him for mercy and forgiveness. If a woman sees in a vision a dead person whom she knew offering her a snake and did not feel fear during the dream, this indicates that her marriage is approaching with a good man, but he is strict and difficult by nature. The vision indicates the emergence of many disagreements between the girl and her family And her inability to resolve these disputes makes her feel hopeless and psychologically uncomfortable. Interpretation of a dream about a snake and a dead woman for a married woman: A married woman’s vision of her dead father killing a snake indicates a big problem that she would have fallen into, but God Almighty saved her from it and removed the evil from her. If the deceased was angry During the vision, and there were a lot of snakes around him, this indicates that there will be many disagreements with her husband in the coming period, and she may end up in divorce if she does not try.

title: Interpretation of seeing baby snot in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning a child’s snot: Cleaning a child’s snot in a dream indicates the completion of many tasks in a short period of time. The vision indicates the dreamer’s activity. Seeing a child’s green snot in a dream indicates his recovery from illnesses and enjoyment of health and well-being. The childbirth falling to the ground expresses the mother’s fatigue in Raising her children because of his excessive unhappiness. Interpretation of seeing dirt from a dry nose coming out in a dream for a man. Getting out of dirt from a dry nose in a dream. Cleaning it is evidence of the purity of the dreamer’s heart and his good intentions in dealing with friends. The vision symbolizes the dreamer’s acquaintance among people with his sober mind. The vision predicts that the patient will recover and regain his health. Once again. Seeing a man in a dream is an indication of paying off debts and getting a lot to live on after a period of distress. Interpretation of a dream of dead mucus in a dream. Seeing a dead person’s nose in a dream is an indication of afterlife bliss, and God knows best. The vision shows the goodness that the dreamer will receive soon. The vision expresses the dreamer’s communication with Paying zakat and praying for the deceased. A married woman’s dream symbolizes her longing for the dead, and it also foretells the approaching date of her pregnancy, and God knows best. If seeing mucus coming out of a dead person in a dream disturbs the dreamer, this is evidence of the dreamer’s desire to be free from chains and escape the ordinary. The dream For a single young man, it heralds that his wedding date is approaching. The dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she excels exceptionally, whether in studies or at work. Interpretation of seeing a runny nose in a dream Questions In the dream, this indicates the dreamer’s distance from people who are harming him. The vision symbolizes the dreamer’s inability to overcome Fears and feelings of discomfort. The vision is a message to the dreamer about the necessity of adopting a positive attitude and not giving in to psychological pressures. The dream indicates the difficult psychological state that the dreamer is going through and the constant feeling of anxiety and turmoil. The vision portends great goodness that the dreamer will soon obtain. The vision indicates the occurrence of positive changes and important events. The dreamer passes through it. Interpretation of the appearance of mucus in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. They symbolize seeing blowing nasal mucus. Throwing it on the ground gives birth to a female. The vision heralds the death of worries and the justice of the dreamer’s circumstances. Seeing a debtor in a dream indicates paying off debts. Interpretation of seeing black mucus in a dream. Black mucus in a dream, this indicates Discharge of debts and relief from distress. Seeing black mucus removed from the nose in an unmarried woman’s dream means getting rid of the consequences she faces. Black mucus indicates disagreements and challenges that God faces in his work. Interpretation of seeing nose cleaning in a dream for a manSeeing nose mucus in a man’s dream Evidence that he is known among the people for his hypocrisy and deceit of others. The vision symbolizes a man’s betrayal of his wife. Seeing water coming out of a man’s nose warns of earning illicit money. Mucus in a dream. The man. The person in question symbolizes solving problems and experiences sadness and anguish. The man’s mucus coming out in the shape of a bird is a sign of the birth of children. Righteous people who memorize the Book of God and have a bright future. Seeing mucus coming out with water

title: Interpretation of a dream about mice

preview.html: These are those who consider mice to be wonderful pets or destructive pests that many people chase in an attempt to get rid of them because they spoil the furniture and clothes in the house, so many are afraid to see a mouse in a dream because of the concomitant acts of vandalism but in reality they are creatures that symbolize instinct. And endurance and the ability to adapt and focus very well, and seeing mice in dreams can mean different things, and the following is Ibn Sirin’s detailed interpretation of seeing mice in a dream.Interpretation of seeing mice in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin says: Mice in a dream are abhorrent, because they appear Pressure is controlling the dreamer, and his vision shows a large number of bad deeds. According to the hadith of Aisha, he said: “The Messenger,” may God bless him and grant him peace, ordered the killing of five sinners in the shrine, and they are: the kite, the crow, the mouse, the scorpion, and the barren dog. “All the chaos came with it.” Meanings of dreams about mice Dreams about mice have a number of meanings, including: Self-concept Your dreams of mice may indicate how you see yourself, the people around you, or life in general. If you see yourself in the form of a rat, it is likely that you are afraid of something or that someone is chasing you. Feel guilty The meaning of the dream depends on your life situations, if you feel guilty in real life, it is common to dream of rats, it is possible that you have hurt someone With your actions or words and that your mind is trying to defend your actions. It says that you did nothing wrong, but deep down you feel that you were wrong to do it. Warning to you: Dreaming about mice is a warning to you that someone is deceiving you in your real life and this dream is just a warning to you. Betrayal could be by someone you love and care about and the dream can also mean that you are trying to betray someone and planning to hurt them. Someone close to you is sick When we hear the word rats, the first thing that comes to mind is illness, and the presence of rats in your dream can be a warning of The illness of someone close to you. Interpretation of seeing brown rats in dreams. The brown rat is the most common, it is considered a symbol of happiness, and a brown rat can be a sign of getting a job, it means that you want to prove yourself but you are facing difficulties. Interpretation of seeing black rats in a dreamBlack rats in a dream It is a sign of the presence of many enemies in the dreamer’s life and it is a sign that he will suffer from the hatred of those around him, and black mice in a dream indicate gains from many large and successive financial losses in the coming days. Interpretation of seeing white mice in a dream White mice are a sign of abundance of food And the acquisition of many goods, and a sign of a husband soon if the dreamer is single, and white mice in a married or married dream indicate multiple offspring. Interpretation of seeing a dead mouse Seeing a dead mouse in a dream means that you are facing problems and overcoming them well and it may indicate that there is something that you have neglected for a while Long needs your attention. Interpretation of seeing killing or...

title: Interpretation of seeing a palm tree in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a date tree in a dream or vision through the vision website roy2a.com. The palm tree is a perennial tree that is distinguished by its great height and produces dates of various types. Seeing date trees in a dream has many connotations. A single man or woman, married or pregnant, today through the vision site, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a palm tree in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of senior interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing a palm tree in a dream for Ibn Sirin: Seeing a palm tree in a dream indicates the useful knowledge that the viewer possesses. Seeing a palm tree in a dream indicates a righteous wife with good morals. Seeing palm trees in a dream for a merchant shows the profits he will get from his deals. Seeing a person with many palm trees in a dream announces that he will have a distinguished position among people. Seeing a killed palm in a dream indicates the difficulty of travel for the visionary. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bee in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a palm tree in a dream for a single woman: Seeing single palm trees in the sky M indicates the good that will come to her soon or that her wedding date will be soon. Seeing an unmarried woman planting a palm tree in a dream shows that he will fight hard until he gets the livelihood he seeks. What is the interpretation of seeing a palm tree in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in The dream states that her husband is good and a good person or indicates that his life will be long. Seeing a married woman planting palm trees in a dream indicates that she will have many children in her life, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a palm tree in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant palm tree in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Seeing a pregnant woman with a short palm tree in a dream announces that she will give birth to a girl, and God knows best. What is the interpretation of seeing a tall palm tree in a dream: Seeing a man with a tall palm tree in a dream indicates a righteous wife who helps her husband and cooperates with him in his life. Seeing a single man with a tall palm tree in a dream announces that he will marry a virgin girl with good morals. Seeing a tall palm tree in a dream indicates a year that will end with great success and distinction in work for the fortune teller. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a fruitful palm tree in a dream: Seeing a fruitful palm tree in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and the achievement of goals. Seeing a fruitful palm tree in a dream It indicates that money and goodness will come to the dreamer and pay The debtor's debt. Seeing a fruitful palm tree in a dream is a woman who gives birth to many children or enjoys beauty and good morals. Seeing a tall and fruitful palm tree in a dream indicates that the viewer enjoys luxury, health and longevity. Seeing a fruitful palm tree in a dream means a woman who gives birth to a male in the same year, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing the plant of happiness in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing a small palm tree in a dream: Seeing a small hand in a dream It indicates the loss of money and the exhaustion of the dreamer to earn a living. Seeing a small hand in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about a bird biting me in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about walking in the desert according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I saw walking in the desert in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced man, for a man. I dreamed that I was walking in the sand of the desert and confusion in the desert and in the land of Ibn Sirin, for the sake of Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Usaimi and others. Seeing walking in the desert in a dream is one of the dreams that many people see in their dreams and it causes them Much concern and confusion in order to obtain a correct interpretation of the vision. The desert in general life symbolizes isolation and distance. Of men, it is one of the places where there is no human or living being; Because it is difficult to live or exist in it due to its absolutely unbearable weather, and the desert is one of the most abundant places. In the Arab world and it is located in very vast areas, and in our article today we will explain to you the interpretation of the vision of walking in the desert, as interpreted by the translator Ibn Sirin in his interpretations.Interpretation of walking in the desert in a dream by Ibn SirinThe dreamer who walks in the desert is a dream that symbolizes many different things, among which is that it He seeks to achieve a very strong goal in public life and will suffer from achieving the goal. Walking in the desert in a dream. Evidence that the dreamer is trying to achieve his goals in public life and that he will succeed in achieving his goals in the near future, after a long struggle. Walking in the desert in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will face many difficulties and obstacles to achieve his goals and dreams in public life. Walking in the desert also suggests That the dreamer will face some problems in the near future. Getting lost in the desert in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is a resourceful person who makes many wrong decisions in all matters of his life. The dreamer walking in the desert in search of a well to drink in a dream is evidence that the dreamer must get tired. In order to make money and achieve success in public life. Searching for a source of water in a dream indicates that the dreamer needs to make greater effort in his life. Interpretation of walking in the desert in a dream: Walking in the desert is a symbol of the isolation that the dreamer suffers from despite his presence in the midst of mass society. He is exposed to emotional and psychological loneliness. If the dreamer voluntarily goes to the desert, then this isolation is temporary. When you see yourself walking in the desert in a dream, it may be a sign of loneliness or isolation. The desert indicates isolation, contemplation, separation from daily life and an attempt to get closer to God. Walking in the desert also suggests the emptiness that the dreamer is experiencing, and it is often an emotional emptiness and he suffers from extreme boredom, deprivation and the desire to start a new life. And when you see yourself walking in the desert and feel lost And not being able to return, this reflects feelings of being unable to escape from situations that you do not accept. For example, if a man dreams that he is walking in the desert, this indicates his desire to leave his job. If a woman dreams that she is standing in the desert alone and married, this means She is unhappy in her marriage and does not feel loved. Some say that dreaming of walking in the desert means loss and misery, and that you may suffer from difficulties and despair.

title: Seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees that a person is falling to the ground in a dream. This indicates that she went through a period in her life in which she suffered from many crises. When she sees in her dream that she is falling in a strange and invisible place. This A warning to her that there is someone who carries a lot of hatred and hatred towards her. Seeing that he fell to the ground and suffered damage, this indicates a difficult situation for him to fall into. Likewise, if an unmarried woman sees that she is falling to the ground without harming her, then this is good news that she will marry someone Morals and religion with whom you feel safe and stable. Seeing him standing up after falling is a sign of overcoming the crises he was going through. If a single woman sees someone falling to the ground, this indicates what is happening in her subconscious. When she sees a child falling on his head, this is a sign of envy. If someone sees a child falling from above, this is good news for a close relationship. See also: Interpretation of seeing or falling in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation of seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman falling to the ground. This indicates negative changes that are occurring. In her life and returning to it negatively. If she sees herself falling from a height without getting hurt. This is a harbinger of a major transformation taking place in her life, every success after failure. Also, if a woman sees someone in a state of falling. This reflects the psychological crises that this woman is going through, which She suffers from it a lot at this time. Seeing someone falling to the ground. It is a sign of her recklessness that leads her to wrong decisions. If a married woman sees that she is in a deteriorating state, this is good news for her that she will become pregnant in the near future. A married woman who sees one of her children falling From a height, she expresses her constant fear of them. To see that her husband is the one falling to the ground is a sign of disagreement between them. Interpretation of seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a divorced woman falling to the ground in a dream is a sign of the problems she is suffering from. If she sees She falls asleep without being hurt. This is a sign of her willingness to help her face the challenges she is going through. When a divorced woman sees a familiar face, she falls to the ground in a dream. This expresses the passion she carries inside her to know news of this man and take care of him. By seeing the woman herself in A state of deterioration, expressing the crises that she will be exposed to in the coming days. Her falling in a clean place is considered a harbinger of the end of all the sorrows that she is experiencing and feeling. Seeing that she is sad for someone who falls to the ground in a dream in front of her. This expresses the pressures that she feels on the psychological level as a result of Her life is full of crises and problems. Read also: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a high place and waking up. Interpretation of seeing someone falling to the ground in a dream about a man and its meaning. If a man sees someone falling to the ground in a dream, this is good news about a high rank that he will reach. Seeing the dreamer himself falling from a low place To hurt him. This is considered a sign of positive changes that will occur in his life. Such as seeing a familiar face

title: What is the interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dream for a married woman?

preview.html: Seeing pet dogs in a dream for a married woman: Dogs are characterized by extreme loyalty to their owners, so when they part, they are very sad. However, seeing them in a dream has many different interpretations, some of which are praiseworthy, indicating goodness and living, and others indicating envy and enemy. He lurks for the fortune teller. What is the interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dream for a married woman? Seeing dogs in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of a person in her life who is abusing her and harming her reputation, and it may indicate that she and her husband are exposed to problems that threaten the stability of their lives. It was considered a sign of someone close to her hating living with her husband. If she sees a dog in her dream, this symbolizes that she is a corrupt woman, and if dogs cut her clothes, it means that someone will appear to her. Eating dog milk explains her suffering from many problems and her constant feeling Extremely saddened by the loss of a loved one. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. What is the interpretation of seeing pet dogs in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin? Scientists agreed with Ibn Sirin that The interpretation of a pet dog in a married woman’s dream is evidence that some people are targeting her to destabilize her by creating some problems between her and her husband, and she must beware of them. Seeing a sick dog in a dream indicates fatigue and illness that may affect her, and it also indicates someone’s hostility towards her, but he will not be able to harm her. Or harming her. Seeing a dog in a dream for a married woman symbolizes the presence of an evil woman who wants to harm her in every way, but she will overtake her and escape from her. The most important interpretations of seeing pet dogs in a dream for a married woman. Seeing feeding pet dogs in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman dreams that she is preparing food for a small puppy , this means that she will be blessed with kindness and abundant money. If she sees that she is feeding the dog with meat, this means that someone she hates will help her. Seeing the dog drinking some water indicates the abundance of goodness and blessing and declares her sincerity with her friends, the continuity of friendship and love between them, and her presence by their side whenever they need her, And that she has noble and aristocratic qualities. Seeing pet dogs attacking me in a dream for a married woman. A dog that attacks a married woman in her sleep while trying in every way to keep her away from her is evidence of the presence of an enemy who is after her to destroy her married life and strain her relationship with her husband until this leads to separation. But she will triumph over him soon. The dog’s attack on her also indicates that she went through some crises and difficulties and her bad psychological state at that stage. The vision also symbolizes the presence of some men who approach her and their presence around her could cause problems and conflicts between her and her husband to the point of separation, and this vision It is a warning message to her to set boundaries in dealing with men. Seeing dogs attacking them in a dream means extreme anxiety about the unknown future, and if she sees them trying to catch up with her, this is evidence of the instability of her life.

title: Interpretation of a person’s smell in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a person’s smell in a dream What is the interpretation of a person’s smell in a dream? A question that many people are searching for an answer to, as the interpretation of a person’s smell in a dream is one of the visions related to the morals and reputation of the person whose smell appears in the dream, which means that the more pure and good the smell is, the person is pure, clean, and distinguished by his high morals, and also an interpretation if he appears clean. From a house or a person and from a body part, we will show you. In this article, there is an interpretation of the smell of a person in a dream, on the website Various. The interpretation of seeing a person smelling perfume in a dream about a single girl, and the interpretation of the smell of a person in a dream for a single girl, from visions that have many meanings, as if the person who smelled it does not know her or does not know her. This indicates that someone is trying Her temptation and she should be too. Beware. If you smell the scent of a man you know and he smells smart and wonderful, this indicates the dreamer’s enthusiasm for this person and her great admiration for him. Interpretation of someone’s smell in a dream and his smell was bad, this indicates the bad reputation of this person and his bad personality. Whoever sees in a dream a strange person emanating from him Bad smell, so think about it again, stop gossiping and prevent bad things. If the dreamer is engaged or emotionally attached to someone and inhales a bad smell in the dream, this is a sign that this person is cheating on her and showing her the opposite of what is inside him, and she will regret it. If he continues to do so in the future. The fragrant smell that an unmarried woman feels in a dream indicates her good reputation, cleanliness, and good behavior among people. Buying perfumes in a dream for a single woman is good news for a stable and happy marriage with a good man with good morals. If she sees An unmarried woman dreams that she smells a strong perfume that does not suit her nature and does not suit her taste in perfume, so this is a sign that she will marry against her will to a person she does not agree with and live with him. for him. It will be difficult and full of misunderstandings. And whoever evaporates perfume in a dream, this indicates the love of those around her for her and that she occupies a great place in people’s hearts. This vision also symbolizes comfort and the disappearance of worries and torment. Interpretation of seeing someone smelling perfume in a dream for a married woman. The interpretation of the smell of human perfume. In a dream for a married woman, it depends on the identity of the person whose perfume was smelled in the dream, and if the smell is bad, then people hate him because of his bad reputation. If a married woman sees someone she knows and smells him in a dream, this means that this person speaks well of her and has a good relationship full of friendship and respect. Restore their relationship. Interpretation of the smell of human scent in a dream for a married woman is considered one of the good visions that symbolize the good biography and good morals that the dreamer enjoys, especially among her husband’s family and their relatives. Whoever sees in her dream that she is perfumed and nourishing her body, then she is a good wife who obeys her husband and guarantees him his rights. She does not violate his rights and the rights of her home and children, and she takes care of herself and her cleanliness. Buying perfumes in a dream indicates the marital happiness enjoyed by the dreamer. Read also: Interpretation of stolen
